name: pH and Conductivity (rapid)
functionStatement: Physical and chemical processes limit pollutants, retain beneficial constituents, and protect ecological and human uses.
descriptionMarkdown: Values near ~6.5-8.5/local norms, no extreme shift unless naturally acidic (bog) or alkaline (arid).

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: pH 4.8 or 10.2. Conductivity > 2000 uS/cm.
Criteria: Extreme pH or very high conductance.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: pH 5.8 or 9.2. Conductivity ~1000 uS/cm.
Criteria: Marked deviation or 800-1500 uS/cm.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: pH 6.3 or 8.7 with otherwise stable chemistry.
Criteria: Slightly off-range or mild elevation.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: pH 7.4. Specific conductance 250 uS/cm.
Criteria: pH ~6.5-8.5 and cond. < 500 uS/cm typical.
